predicate.note: Frames file for 'occasion' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: bring about an event

example.name: ghostbusters?
example.text: For the spooks it's just another day of ectoplasmic business as usual, ghostbusters say; the holiday seems *trace* to occasion no unusual number of ghost reports.
example.arg: no unusual number of ghost reports

roleset.note: I'd have predicted this only to occur in the passive, but the opposite is true. Gofigger.
